page.title: 05ENERGY.
page.content: The pipeline runs through Fawley to Southampton to Wolverhampton for Esso Oil.Farmers are compensated if they dig in their land.Work is done with four gangs of men.They work from Monday till Friday and spend the weekend at home.It started on the 1st April to early July.Down in Lower Moor ,by the railway line there is a hole with pipes around the edge which were yellow and grey pipes in the ground.When it rained it was awefully muddy and they had to have a ramp which caused traffic jams and so they had to have some traffic lights to stop the traffic jams.Our local farmer is called Edward Righton.He was notified last year about proposed work his land and the B 8084.
